name: Elly In Wonderland
description: Sir Electron fawl simply wishes to live a peaceful life in his twilight years, but maybe fate has something else planned? Follow the harrowing tale of a man broken by a hard life, and come with him in an adventure of the souls. You'll laugh, you'll cry, you'll shit your pants! In this riveting game with an entire two dimensions! Some number of choices! Made in a dark room full of soda and bean cans by 7 Mavericks, can you unravel the mystery of shitpost cove?
